alert.note: Alert for Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 4:38PM EDT until June 09 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for portions of... Chatham County in southeastern Georgia... Jasper County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 438 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Garden City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include: Pooler, Tybee Island, Wilmington Island, Fort Pulaski National Monument, I-16/I-95 Interchange, Hunter Army Airfield, Midtown Savannah, Downtown Savannah, Savannah International Airport, Montgomery, Garden City, Port Wentworth, Thunderbolt, Vernonburg and Sandfly. This warning includes the following interstates: I-16 between mile markers 158 and 168. I-516 between mile markers 3 and 9. I-95 in Georgia between mile markers 97 and 101. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
